type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.ConfigurablePublishArtifact
type.description: A PublishArtifact whose properties can be modified.

method.name: builtBy
method.description:
Registers some tasks which build this artifact.
param:tasks The tasks. These are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Task#dependsOn(Object...).

returns:this

method.name: setClassifier
method.description:
Sets the classifier of this artifact.
param:classifier The classifier. May be null.

method.name: setExtension
method.description:
Sets the extension of this artifact.
param:extension The extension. Should not be null.

method.name: setName
method.description:
Sets the name of this artifact.
param:name The name. Should not be null.

method.name: setType
method.description:
Sets the type of this artifact.
param:type The type. Should not be null.

property.name: classifier
property.description:
Sets the classifier of this artifact.
param:classifier The classifier. May be null.

property.name: extension
property.description:
Sets the extension of this artifact.
param:extension The extension. Should not be null.

property.name: name
property.description:
Sets the name of this artifact.
param:name The name. Should not be null.

property.name: type
property.description:
Sets the type of this artifact.
param:type The type. Should not be null.
